data.text: Nayi, Sulemani yi a fala, a naxa,
N bata banxi faɲin ti
Mangan yi a yɛɛ rafindi Isirayila yamaan ma naxanye birin yi tixi na, a duba e xa.
A yi a fala, a naxa, “Tantunna Alatala xa, Isirayilaa Ala, naxan falan ti n fafe Dawuda xa, naxan a falane rakamalima, a naxa,

‘Xabu n nan n ma Isirayila yamaan namini lɔxɔni Misiran yamanani, n mi taa sugandi Isirayila bɔnsɔnne xa, banxin tiyɛ n xinla binya feen na dɛnaxan yi, n mi mangan sugandi alogo a xa lu n ma Isirayila yamaan xun na.
Koni iki, n bata Yerusalɛn sugandi alogo n xinla xa lu na yi, n bata Dawuda sugandi alogo a xa lu n ma Isirayila yamaan xun na.’
N fafe Dawuda yi waxi banxin ti feni Alatala xinla binyaden na, Isirayilaa Ala.
Alatala bata yi a fala n fafe xa, a naxa, ‘Amasɔtɔ i bata wa banxin ti feni n xinla binyaden na, na miriyaan tongo feen bata lan.
Koni, i tan xa mi banxin tima, fɔ i ya diina, i naxan sɔtɔxi, na nan banxin tima n xinla binyaden na.’ ”

Sulemani mɔn yi a fala, a naxa, “Alatala layirin naxan tongo, a bata na rakamali. N bata ti n fafe Dawuda ɲɔxɔni, n yi dɔxɔ Isirayila mangan na, alo Alatala a fala kii naxan yi, n yi banxin ti Alatala xinla binyaden na, Isirayilaa Ala.
N bata sa Layiri Kankiraan dɔxɔ mɛnni. Alatala layirin naxan xidi e nun Isirayila kaane tagi, na taxamasenna nan saxi a kui.”
Sulemani yi ti Alatalaa yire sariɲanxin yɛtagi, Isirayila yamaan birin yɛtagi. A yi a yiine yite kore.

Sulemani bata yi gbingbinna rafala wure gbeela ra tanden tagi, a yi kuya nɔngɔnna yɛ suulun, a yite nɔngɔnna yɛ saxan. A te na fari, a yi a xinbi sin Isirayila yamaan birin yɛtagi. A yi a yiine yite kore,

a yi Ala maxandi, a naxa, “Alatala, Isirayilaa Ala! Ala yo mi na alo i tan kore xɔnna ma hanma bɔxɔ xɔnna fari. I ya layirin nun i ya hinanna luma nɛn i ya walikɛne xa naxanye sigan tima i yɛtagi e bɔɲɛn birin na.
I bata i ya falan nakamali i ya walikɛɛn xa, n fafe Dawuda, i naxan fala i dɛɛn na, i bata na rakamali i sɛnbɛni to.

Iki, Alatala, Isirayilaa Ala, i mɔn xa a liga i layirin naxan tongo n fafe Dawuda xa, i bata yi a fala a xa, i naxa, ‘I ɲɔxɔ yibiran mi ɲanɲɛ n yɛtagi mumɛ Isirayilaa mangaya gbɛdɛni, xa i ya diine n ma kiraan suxu, e sigan ti n yɛtagi tinxinni, e n ma sariyan suxu alo i sigan tixi n yɛtagi kii naxan yi.’
Iki, Alatala, Isirayilaa Ala, n bata i mafan, i xa na rakamali, i layirin naxan tongoxi i ya walikɛɛn Dawuda xa!
Koni, Ala fa dɔxɛ muxune tagi dunuɲa yi ba? Hali kore xɔnna nun a gbona, i mi nɔɛ xaɲɛ a yi, e faxi fa n banxin naxan tixi ito ra.
Hali na birin, Alatala, n ma Ala, i tuli matima i ya walikɛna maxandine nun a mafanne ra, i tuli mati i tantun xuine nun maxandi xuine ra i ya walikɛɛn naxanye tima i xa to.
I yɛɛne ti banxini ito ra kɔɛɛn nun yanyin na. I a fala dɛnaxan ma, i naxa, ‘N xinla luma be nɛn!’ I tuli mati maxandi xuiin na i ya walikɛɛn naxan tima yireni ito mabinni.
I ya walikɛɛn nun i ya Isirayila yamana maxandine rasuxu, e na sali yireni ito mabinni! I yabin ti i dɔxɔdeni kore xɔnna ma, i mafeluun ti, i yabin ti.”
“Xa muxuna nde a boden hakɛn tongo, a yi nɔɔn sa a ma, a rakɔlɔ, a xa fa a kɔlɔ i ya yire sariɲanxin yɛtagi banxini ito kui.
I a xuiin namɛ kore, i tin, i ya walikɛne kitin sa, i yi fe kalan yalagi, i yi a fe kalan goronna dɔxɔ a xun ma, i yi tɔɲɛgɛlana kitin sa, i yi a suxu a tɔɲɛgɛni.”
“A nɔɛ ligɛ nɛn yaxun yi i ya Isirayila yamaan nɔ, bayo e bata i yulubin tongo. Na waxatini, xa e xun xɛtɛ, e i xinla binya, e yi i maxandi, e mafeluun xandi i yɛtagi banxini ito kui,
nayi, i xa e xuiin namɛ kore, i diɲa i ya Isirayila yamaan yulubin ma, i fa e ra bɔxɔn ma i naxan so e tan nun e benbane yii.”

“A nɔɛ ligɛ nɛn kore xɔnna yi balan, tulen mi fa fɛ mumɛ e yulubine fe ra lan i tan ma. Na waxatini, xa e yɛɛ rafindi be ma, e yi i xandi, e yi i xinla binya, e xɛtɛ e yulubine fɔxɔ ra, bayo i bata e ɲaxankata,

nayi, i e xuiin namɛma nɛn kore, i diɲama nɛn i ya walikɛne yulubine ma e nun i ya Isirayila yamana. I yi e xaran kira faɲin ma e daxa e xa bira naxan fɔxɔ ra. I tulen nafa bɔxɔn fari i naxan soxi i ya yamaan yii.”

“A nɔɛ ligɛ nɛn tɔrɔyana nde fan yi fa, alo fitina kamɛna hanma fitina furena yamanani, hanma sansine yi xara, e kun hanma tuguminne yi mini hanma suɲɛne hanma yaxune na Isirayila kaane tɔrɔ waxatin naxan yi han e taa makantanxine yi, gbalon sifan birin na fa waxatin naxan yi, hanma fure ɲaxine.
Na waxatine yi, Isirayila kaane birin e tɔrɔn nun e ɲaxankatan kolonma nɛn, e yi sali, e yi i mafan, e yi e yiine yite banxini ito mabinni.
Nayi, i yi e yabi i dɔxɔdeni kore xɔnna ma, i yi e mafelu, i yi birin saran e kɛwanle ra, bayo i birin bɔɲɛ yi feen kolon, amasɔtɔ i tan nan keden pe adamadiine bɔɲɛ yi feene kolon.
Nayi, e gaxuma nɛn i yɛɛ ra, e lu i ya kiraan xɔn ma waxatin birin yi, e siin birin yi yamanani, i naxan soxi nxu benbane yii.”
“Xɔɲɛn naxan mi findixi i ya Isirayila yamaan muxun na, na fama nɛn be sa keli yamana makuyeni, i xili gbeen nun i sɛnbɛ gbeena fe ra. A na fa salideni banxini ito mabinni,

i a yabi kore xɔnna ma, i dɔxɔdeni. Xɔɲɛn na naxan birin maxɔdin i ma, i xa na so a yii, alogo dunuɲa siyane birin xa i xinla kolon, e gaxu i yɛɛ ra, alo Isirayila i ya yamana. E xa a kolon a banxi radaxaxin ni ito ra i tan xinli n naxan tixi!”
“A nɔɛ ligɛ nɛn Isirayila kaane yi siga e yaxune yɛngɛdeni i ya yamarin bun. E yi i maxandi, e yɛɛ rafindi i ya taa sugandixin ma e nun n na Ala Batu Banxin naxan tixi i xa.
Nayi, i tuli mati kore xɔnna ma, naxanye i maxandima, e i mafan, i yi ne mali.”

“A nɔɛ liga nɛn, e yi yulubin tongo, bayo adamadi yo mi na naxan mi yulubin ligama. I ya xɔlɔn yitama e ra nɛn, i yi e so e yaxune yii, ne yi siga e ra konyiyani e yamana makuyena ndee yi hanma naxanye maso.
Koni, e na tubi yamanani e konyiyani dɛnaxan yi, e xɛtɛ i ma e suxu muxune yamanani, e falan ti, e naxa, ‘Nxu bata yulubin tongo, nxu bata hakɛn liga, nxu bata fe ɲaxin liga,’

e xɛtɛ i ma e bɔɲɛn birin na, e niin birin yi e suxu muxune yamanani naxanye e xalixi konyiyani, e mayandine rasiga i ma, e yɛɛ rafindixi yamanan ma i naxan so e benbane yii, e yɛɛ rafindixi i ya taa sugandixin ma e nun n na Ala Batu Banxin naxan tixi i xinli,
nayi, e sanla nun mafanne yabi kore xɔnna ma i dɔxɔdeni, i fa e mali, i yi i ya yamaan mafelu e yulubine ra.”
“N ma Ala, i yɛɛn nakeli, i yi i tuli mati i maxandi xuiin na yireni ito yi, nxu na i xandi waxatin naxan yi.”
